description:
Microsoft Access is a database creation and management program. To understand Microsoft Access, you must first understand basics of databases.

In this Course, you will learn about Access databases and how they are used.

  • After conclusion of this workshop, you will be able to demonstrate proficiency while completing the following activities:
  • Create a database file using electronic media
  • Design, create, and populate a database table
  • Design and use a database form with the form wizard
  • Obtain selected information from a table by using query criteria
  • Produce hard copy from query output.
  • Design an attractive report while using the report wizard
title: Introduction to Microsoft Access Database for Beginners
